  2. AI and You: Expect More Fake AI Images; OpenAI-Musk, OpenAI-NYT Battles Continue  CNET
  3. Censored Microsoft Copilot can still make vulgar images  Windows Central
  4. Copilot can't stop emitting violent, sexual images, says Microsoft whistleblower  The Register
  5. Microsoft's Copilot now blocks some prompts that generated violent and sexual images  Engadget
